remarks: Vector subtraction on a subspace is a restriction of vector subtraction on the parent space.  (Contributed by NM, 28-Jan-2008.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sspm.y $e |- Y = ( BaseSet ` W ) $.
sspm.m $e |- M = ( -v ` U ) $.
sspm.l $e |- L = ( -v ` W ) $.
sspm.h $e |- H = ( SubSp ` U ) $.
sspm $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ W e. H ) -> L = ( M |` ( Y X. Y ) ) ) $.
